page.title: 02Aday in the life of.....
page.content: My mum wakes me up at about half past seven and I have{breakfast.It's usually cereal,sometimes tea and toast.At eight my friend Sarah comes to call for me and we go to school. After the register we go into assembly where we listen to a story and sing hymns.We also listen to music.I liked it when we heard Do they know it's Christmas.In the morning we do maths which I don't like much.But I like maths programs on the{computer. In the afternoon we have English,Topic and P.E.At{playtimes we play deno or tick.I finish school at 3.45 and when I get home I rush to change and go out to play.After tea I watch telly and have to go to bed about 9.30.But at weekends I can stay up and watch horror films.
